price: ߒ߬ߓߵߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߟߝߊߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߝߊߙߊ߲ߝߊߛߌ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߛߌߟߊ ߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߜߍ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlu al-muj'rimīna
